results.title: Tomb Raider
results.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2018
results.brief_description: Lara Croft, the fiercely independent daughter of a missing adventurer, must push herself beyond her limits when she finds herself on the island where her father disappeared.

constellations_other.name: Representation of women in videogames
constellations_other.description: Ms Pac-Man is the first famous female game protagonist, but let's face it â€“ she's just Pac-Man with a bow. This Constellation looks at the history of female representation in videogames.

results.headline_credit_for_label: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2018
results.description: Lara Croft, the fiercely independent daughter of a missing adventurer, must push herself beyond her limits when she finds herself on the island where her father disappeared.

results.title: Tokyo Olympiad
results.creator_credit: Tokyo Olympic Film Association, Kon Ichikawa, Natto Wada, Yoshio Shirasaka, Shuntaro Tanikawa and Taguchi Suketaro
results.brief_description: This impressionistic portrait of the 1964 Tokyo Summer Olympics pays as much attention to the crowds and workers as it does to the actual competitive events. Highlights include an epic pole-vaulting match between West Germany and America, and the final marathon race through Tokyo’s streets.

constellations_other.name: No guts, no glory
constellations_other.description: TV arrived just in time for the 1956 Melbourne Olympics. The Olympics crystallise ideas of nationalism, athletic heroism, and controversy, all of which have been explored through countless features, documentaries and TV shows.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Tokyo Olympic Film Association, Kon Ichikawa, Natto Wada, Yoshio Shirasaka, Shuntaro Tanikawa and Taguchi Suketaro
results.description: This impressionistic portrait of the 1964 Tokyo Summer Olympics pays as much attention to the crowds and workers as it does to the actual competitive events. Highlights include an epic pole-vaulting match between West Germany and America, and the final marathon race through Tokyo’s streets. Two athletes are highlighted: Ethiopian marathon runner Abebe Bikila, who receives his second gold medal, and runner Ahamed Isa from Chad, representing a country younger than he is.
description_for_label: This impressionistic portrait of the 1964 Tokyo Summer Olympics pays as much attention to the crowds and workers as it does to the actual competitive events. Highlights include an epic pole-vaulting match between West Germany and America, and the final marathon race through Tokyo’s streets. Two athletes are highlighted: Ethiopian marathon runner Abebe Bikila, who receives his second gold medal, and runner Ahamed Isa from Chad, representing a country younger than he is.

results.title: To Wong Foo, Thanks for Everything! Julie Newmar
results.brief_description: Three New York drag queens gets stranded in small town America on their way to a Hollywood beauty pageant. While waiting for parts, the flamboyant trio shows local homophobes their humanity.

constellations_other.name: Joy of drag
constellations_other.description: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert is a groundbreaking Australian film with a small budget and big impact that's taken queer Australian stories to the world.

constellations_other.name: Dance sequins
constellations_other.description: Looking at dance, ballroom, the Glitter Trilogy and the Red Curtain Trilogy.

results.title_for_label: To Wong Foo, Thanks for Everything! Julie Newmar
results.description: Three New York drag queens on their way to Hollywood for a beauty pageant get stranded in a small Midwestern town for the entire weekend when their car breaks down. While waiting for parts for their Cadillac convertible, the flamboyant trio shows the local homophobic rednecks that appearing different doesn’t mean they don’t have humanity in common.
description_for_label: Three New York drag queens on their way to Hollywood for a beauty pageant get stranded in a small Midwestern town for the entire weekend when their car breaks down. While waiting for parts for their Cadillac convertible, the flamboyant trio shows the local homophobic rednecks that appearing different doesn’t mean they don’t have humanity in common.

results.title: Titanic
results.creator_credit: Paramount, Lightstorm Entertainment, 20th Century Fox, Deborah Lynn Scott, James Cameron, John Bruno, Jon Landau and Peter Lamont
results.brief_description: 101-year-old Rose DeWitt Bukater tells the story of her life aboard the Titanic, 84 years later. A young Rose boards the ship with her mother and fiancÃ©. Meanwhile, Jack Dawson and Fabrizio De Rossi win third-class tickets aboard the ship. Rose tells the whole story from Titanic’s departure through to its deathâ€”on its first and last voyageâ€”on April 15, 1912.

constellations_other.name: Bell & Howell Projector 621: This picture has been edited for content
constellations_other.description: The Bell & Howell-Gaumont Model 621 projector was originally used entertain the shearers on a sheep farm in South Australia with the films screened sometimes edited for distribution.

results.title: Timecrimes
results.brief_description: A man accidentally gets into a time machine and travels back in time nearly an hour. Finding himself will be the first of a series of disasters of unforeseeable consequences.
results.description: A man accidentally gets into a time machine and travels back in time nearly an hour. Finding himself will be the first of a series of disasters of unforeseeable consequences.
description_for_label: A man accidentally gets into a time machine and travels back in time nearly an hour. Finding himself will be the first of a series of disasters of unforeseeable consequences.

results.title: Timecode
results.brief_description: An inventive film that follows four storylines unfolding simultaneously in each quarter of the screen, which are all composed of one shot.

constellations_other.name: Lois Weber and the split-screen
constellations_other.description: Lois Weber was the third filmmaker to use split screens to show simultaneous action, helping establish it as part of cinematic language, particularly its use in thrillers. It's since been taken to extremes by auteurs and videogames.

results.description: A production company begins casting for its next feature, and an up-and-coming actress named Rose tries to manipulate her filmmaker boyfriend, Alex, into giving her a screen test. Alex’s wife, Emma, knows about the affair and is considering divorce, while Rose’s girlfriend secretly spies on her and attempts to sabotage the relationship. The four storylines in the film were each shot in one take and are shown simultaneously, each taking up a quarter of the screen.
description_for_label: A production company begins casting for its next feature, and an up-and-coming actress named Rose tries to manipulate her filmmaker boyfriend, Alex, into giving her a screen test. Alex’s wife, Emma, knows about the affair and is considering divorce, while Rose’s girlfriend secretly spies on her and attempts to sabotage the relationship. The four storylines in the film were each shot in one take and are shown simultaneously, each taking up a quarter of the screen.

results.title: Thunderbirds
results.brief_description: Thunderbirds is a 1960s British science-fiction television series which was produced using a mixed method of marionette puppetry and scale-model special effects termed “Supermarionation”. The series is set in the 21st century and follows the exploits of International Rescue, a secret organization formed to save people in mortal danger with the help of technologically advanced land, sea, air and space vehicles and equipment, launched from a hidden base on Tracy Island in the South Pacific Ocean.
results.description: Thunderbirds is a 1960s British science-fiction television series which was produced using a mixed method of marionette puppetry and scale-model special effects termed “Supermarionation”. results.title: Three Times
results.brief_description: There are three stories of women and men. In the first two stories, letters are crucial to the outcome; in the third, itâ€™s cell-phone calls, text messages, and a computer file. Over the years between the tales, as sexual intimacy becomes more likely and words more free, communication recedes.

constellations_other.name: Place, portraiture, performance
constellations_other.description: The nature of the collaboration between David Gulpilil and Rolf De Heer on Ten Canoes connects the film to their other collaborations, and a number of other works as well.

results.description: There are three stories of women and men: in “A Time for Love” set in 1966, a soldier searches for a young woman he met one afternoon playing pool; “A Time for Freedom,” set in a bordello in 1911, revolves around a singer’s longing to escape her surroundings; in “A Time for Youth” set in 2005 Taipei, a triangle in which a singer has an affair with a photographer while her partner suffers is dramatized. In the first two stories, letters are crucial to the outcome; in the third, it’s cell-phone calls, text messages, and a computer file. Over the years between the tales, as sexual intimacy becomes more likely and words more free, communication recedes.
description_for_label: There are three stories of women and men: in “A Time for Love” set in 1966, a soldier searches for a young woman he met one afternoon playing pool; “A Time for Freedom,” set in a bordello in 1911, revolves around a singer’s longing to escape her surroundings; in “A Time for Youth” set in 2005 Taipei, a triangle in which a singer has an affair with a photographer while her partner suffers is dramatized. In the first two stories, letters are crucial to the outcome; in the third, it’s cell-phone calls, text messages, and a computer file. Over the years between the tales, as sexual intimacy becomes more likely and words more free, communication recedes.

results.title: Three Little Pigs
results.brief_description: The two pigs building houses of hay and sticks scoff at their brother, building the brick house. But when the wolf comes around and blows their houses down (after trickery like dressing as a foundling sheep fails), they run to their brother’s house. And throughout, they sing the classic song, “Who’s Afraid of the Big Bad Wolf?”.

constellations_other.name: Auteurs, influence and inspiration
constellations_other.description: A tradition of influence and inspiration beginning with Eisenstein.

results.title: Thor: Ragnarok
results.brief_description: Thor is imprisoned on the other side of the universe and finds himself in a race against time to get back to Asgard to stop Ragnarok, the destruction of his home-world and the end of Asgardian civilization, at the hands of an all-powerful new threat, the ruthless Hela.

constellations_other.name: Superhero special effects
constellations_other.description: VFX talent isn't limited to just one studio that makes superhero blockbusters.
